sentence: Representative Jaime Herrera Beutler, a Washington Republican, said that Trump responded to McCarthy by saying, "Well, Kevin, I guess these people are more upset about the election than you are."
author: Jason Lemon
title: Donald Trump's Jan. 6 Actions Qualify as 'Treason': Glenn Kirschner

sentence: A former Army Special Forces officer, Kent is running to replace Rep. Jaime Herrera Beutler (Wash.), one of 10 Republicans who voted to impeach Trump in the House.
author: Josh Dawsey
title: More Republicans are working to undermine Trump endorsements
